comment: . PLEASE READ COMPLETE It's Official ! Our first collaborative Men's home has been blessed and the ceremony took place last night ! and Calgary Home is at maximum capacity after week !
amr:
# ::snt . PLEASE READ COMPLETE It's Official ! Our first collaborative Men's home has been blessed and the ceremony took place last night ! and Calgary Home is at maximum capacity after week !
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (a / and
            :op1 (r / read-01
                  :mode imperative
                  :polite +
                  :ARG0 (y / you)
                  :ARG1 (ii / it
                        :mod (o / official))
                  :ARG1-of (c / complete-02))
            :op2 (a2 / and
                  :op1 (b / bless-01
                        :ARG1 (h / home
                              :mod (m2 / men)
                              :ord (o2 / ordinal-entity
                                    :value 1)
                              :ARG0-of (c2 / collaborate-01)
                              :poss (w / we))
                        :time (d / date-entity
                              :dayperiod (n / night)
                              :mod (y2 / yesterday)))
                  :op2 (c3 / ceremony
                        :time d)))
      :snt2 (c4 / capacity
            :mod (m3 / maximum)
            :time (a3 / after
                  :op1 (w2 / week))
            :domain (h2 / home
                  :location (c5 / city
                        :name (n2 / name
                              :op1 "Calgary")))))

comment: . Next we will be opening our Men's indigenous recovery home in this is such a much needed service . The sector needs to take notice of what is possible when we work together .
amr:
# ::snt . Next we will be opening our Men's indigenous recovery home in this is such a much needed service . The sector needs to take notice of what is possible when we work together .
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (o / open-01
            :ARG0 (w / we)
            :ARG1 (h / home
                  :purpose (r / recover-01
                        :ARG1 (m2 / man)
                        :mod (ii / indigenous))
                  :poss w)
            :time (n / next)
            :ARG1-of (s / serve-01
                  :ARG1-of (n2 / need-01
                        :degree (m3 / much
                              :degree (s2 / such)))))
      :snt2 (n3 / need-01
            :ARG0 (s3 / sector)
            :ARG1 (n4 / notice-01
                  :ARG0 s3
                  :ARG1 (t / thing
                        :ARG1-of (p / possible-01))
                  :time (w2 / work-01
                        :ARG0 w
                        :manner (t2 / together)))))

comment: . We are also looking at a possible partnership to open the first women's home on land . and are in the process of putting the program together . This will be yet another revolutionary program focusing on Indigenous recovery .
amr:
# ::snt . We are also looking at a possible partnership to open the first women's home on land . and are in the process of putting the program together . This will be yet another revolutionary program focusing on Indigenous recovery .
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (a / and
            :op1 (l / look-01
                  :ARG0 (w / we)
                  :ARG1 (p / partner-01
                        :ARG0 w
                        :ARG1 (o / open-01
                              :ARG0 w
                              :ARG1 (h / home
                                    :poss (w2 / woman)
                                    :ord (o2 / ordinal-entity
                                          :value 1)
                                    :location (l2 / land)))
                        :ARG1-of (p2 / possible-01))
                  :mod (a2 / also))
            :op2 (p3 / process-02
                  :ARG0 w
                  :ARG1 (p4 / put-03
                        :ARG0 w
                        :ARG1 (p5 / program)
                        :ARG2 (t / together))))
      :snt2 (p6 / program
            :ARG1-of (r / revolutionary-04)
            :mod (a3 / another
                  :mod (y / yet))
            :domain (t2 / this)
            :ARG0-of (f / focus-01
                  :ARG2 (r2 / recover-01
                        :ARG1 (p7 / person
                              :mod (ii / indigenous))))))
